long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides valuable information about websites, domains, and your IP address, right at your fingertips.

With this extension, you can:
1. Easily view the IP address of the website in your current tab.
2. Get detailed information about the IP address or domain you're visiting, including geographical location of hosting and hosting provider.
3. Quickly check your own IP address to ensure your internet connection is secure and know your online location.

Designed with ease-of-use and privacy in mind, this extension does not collect or transmit any data unless you actively open the pop-up and request information.
With its lightweight and fast design, the SiteIP extension is the perfect addition to your browsing arsenal. Try it now and elevate your online experience!
